Malice/ Hellplague:

Malice closed his comm and fell on the bed.  He fell asleep soon 
after.

In his dreams, he met three bots.  The first was a big and tall one, 
he had red eyes and a sinister laugh.  He laughed at Malice, until 
Malice curled up to cover his audios.

The second was a femme, tall and slender.  She too laughed at him, 
and pointed and laughed.

The third and final was also a femme.  But she was differant.  She 
was a little shorter than the previous, and kind.  She kneeled down 
and tried to reach out to him.  He at first, moved away, but then, 
reached for her.

Malice awoke several hours later, sitting up.  He was breathing hard, 
and it triggered a signal in Hellplague.

Hellplague opened a channel to Malice, who ignored it for a moment.
"Yes, Master?"
"Are you alright?  My sensors in your body detected an emotional 
overload.  Ae you okay?"
"Yes, I am fine."
Hellplague closed the channel, and laid back down.  She wondered if 
she should tell Blacknightmare.
"Blacknightmare," she said softly into her comm,"Malice isn't feeling 
good.  He had a dream or something, it really bothered him.  I worry, 
if it will afect his performance somehow.  Should we go and check on 
him?" 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare::
> 
> "Anything else"sais teh femme"Rest well"

> >  
> > Malice rolled off his bed and walked to the door.  He shut the 
> door and locked it, programming the door tone to respond only to

> > "I've locked my door, anything else, Master?"
